articles.author: Mohamed A. Hussein
articles.title: Which countries, other than the US, offer birthright citizenship? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: At least 33 countries, mostly in the Americas, provide automatic citizenship to anyone born within their borders.
articles.content:
A second United States federal judge has blocked President Donald Trumps executive order which aims to end birthright citizenship for children of undocumented immigrants.
Today, virtually every baby… [+3371 chars]
